dfs-ha-namenodes-hdfs.description: The zookeeper the HDFS system should use for HA.  The default is the DCOS zookeeper.

dfs-journalnode-edits-dir.description: The journalnode default edit directory. This is a default value and can be overriden by the executor.

dfs-namenode-name-dir.description: The namenode default directory. This is a default value and can be overriden by the executor.

dfs-datanode-data-dir.description: The data default directory. This is a default value and can be overriden by the executor.

dfs-domain-socket-path.description: The default socket path. This is a default value and can be overriden by the executor.

dfs-datanode-du-reserved.description: Sets the HDFS datanode reserved space.

dfs-datanode-balance-bandwidthPerSec.description: Sets the HDFS datanode balance bandwidth/sec.

dfs-namenode-safemode-threshold-pct.description: Sets the HDFS namenode safemode threshold percentage.

dfs-namenode-heartbeat-recheck-interval.description: Sets the HDFS namenode heartbeat interval.

dfs-datanode-handler-count.description: Sets the HDFS datanode handler count.

dfs-namenode-handler-count.description: Sets the HDFS namenode handler count.

dfs-image-compression-codec.description: Compression codec to use on images in HDFS

dfs-namenode-invalidate-work-pct-per-ite.description: Sets the namenode invalidate work percentage

dfs-namenode-replication-work-multiplier.description: Sets the namenode replication work multiplier

dfs-client-read-shortcircuit-streams-cac.description: Sets the client read shortcircuit cache size.
